comments:
While testing a builder (and therefore doing several background builds in a 
row), I got this error in my development workbench console:

Unhandled event loop exception
Reason:
Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)
*** SWT nested exception
Reason:
java.lang.NullPointerException

and this stack trace in the correpsonding error from the Error Log:

Sorry, I should have said: I installed the WSWB M9 build dated April 7.
Which Eclipse build is that based on?

I believe this has been fixed be a serious of shutdown improvements we have 
done around the builders. If you find it in a build >20040427 please reopen
